content: the gothic crochet stitch is a stitch designed by astra lebedeva2019 on instagram it s an easy two row repeat pattern and i take you step by step on how to create it this stitch is great for making tops or a spring blanket curtains for the home or a swimsuit cover pattern comes with pictures and links to video tutorials i used a 5 mm hook / h hook and worsted weight yarn but this stitch can be made using any size yarn and hook size that the yarn recommends
